function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate estimation of R2 values for fixed-lag lengths","Impact":"Misleading understanding of data and potential misinterpretation of impact","Mitigation":"Use alternative statistical methods to account for delays and lags in policies","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and time-series analysis techniques","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and public health officials","Owner":"Data analysts and researchers"},{"Description":"Mis-coding of post-policy days as no-policy days","Impact":"Underestimation of the effects of policies on disease propagation","Mitigation":"Careful verification of data coding and adjustment for mis-coding errors","Technologies":"Data verification and validation tools, statistical modeling techniques","People":"Data analysts, researchers, and policymakers","Owner":"Data analysts and research teams"},{"Description":"Small sample size in some countries","Impact":"Reduced generalizability and reliability of the findings for those countries","Mitigation":"Collaborate with other research teams to increase sample size and cross-validate results","Technologies":"Collaborative research platforms, data sharing and pooling tools","People":"Research teams and data scientists","Owner":"Research organizations and institutions"}]}
